name: Ignite
description: Time has run out as the building Temporal Cold War ignites into all-out temporal warfare. Can a galaxy already stretched to its limits by rampant anomalies really withstand a war across spacetime?
rules:
-- Unique Maquis, Romulan Star Empire and Terran Empire Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Zero Hour Archer, K'Vagh, Damron, Shran, Enterprise or Temporal Agent crew will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Zero Hour Archer, K'Vagh, Damron, Shran, Enterprise or Temporal Agent
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Kyheem
featured_crew.flavor: After a long grudge against his brother, Kyheem reconciles with him and even asks him to perform the Ikhu Zhen ceremony for his son.

featured_crew.name: Damron
featured_crew.flavor: Damron was a Xindi-Reptilian scientist responsible for the development of a bio-weapon to destroy humanity.

featured_crew.name: Shran
featured_crew.flavor: An Andorian from the Imperial Guard, Shran confronted Captain Archer on the monastery of P'Jem.

rewards.name: Maquis Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Maquis faction missions.

rewards.name: Romulan Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Romulan Star Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Terran Empire Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Terran Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Trip
rewards.flavor: Chief Engineer aboard the NX-01 Enterprise, Tucker remained a hands-on officer unafraid of a little elbow grease.

rewards.name: Maquis Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Maquis faction missions.

rewards.name: Romulan Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Romulan Star Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Terran Empire Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Terran Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Tokens
rewards.flavor: Requisition Shuttle Tokens grant access to an additional Shuttle to use for a single Faction Mission.

rewards.name: Reward Multiplier
rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) 2x rewards.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Kyheem
rewards.flavor: After a long grudge against his brother, Kyheem reconciles with him and even asks him to perform the Ikhu Zhen ceremony for his son.

rewards.name: Shran
rewards.flavor: An Andorian from the Imperial Guard, Shran confronted Captain Archer on the monastery of P'Jem.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: After a long grudge against his brother, Kyheem reconciles with him and even asks him to perform the Ikhu Zhen ceremony for his son.

rewards.name: Shran
rewards.flavor: An Andorian from the Imperial Guard, Shran confronted Captain Archer on the monastery of P'Jem.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Terran Empire faction missions.

potential_rewards.name: Credits
potential_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "We can drop the "Cold" pretense, Captain. We're at full-blown war here. When Weytahn was suddenly overrun with Vulcans, we thought our supposed allies had gone mad. But it would seem the past itself has changed. Though I'm still not convinced they were completely uninvolved."

"Territory shifts are not the only problem. This so-called alliance has disappeared with the equipment they requested. And now, strange maladies rage throughout the Empire, past and present.These temporal agents are the only way we can track that certain Klingons ever existed."

"Those maladies will make their way through the galaxy in due time. The Andorian is correct. This is war. But in a time war, the true victors were chosen long ago. Cease your resistance and perhaps you may be offered a place in the new present. Otherwise, prepare for erasure!"

"What's the endgame here, Damron? You all tear the fabric of space-time into Swiss cheese in a battle for supremacy? For what? What's left for you? Luckily, no one has to find out. We at Starfleet have a hard time just lying down and disappearing, don't we, Captain?"
